TopicTitle: Live Stream: The Kerbin Mission, Kerbin Academy...and other stuff !

Articles.Content:
Hi,

Well I finally made it to orbit ... Gonna work on tweaking my orbiter; need to get a 2t payload to 100k; get to the desert... had to upgrade launch pad once but still have a 30 part limitation. Gonna stream for an hour or so tonite - also I am barely making one hour streams due to game memory so I may have to restart 2 or 3 times.

Cmdr Zeta

Howdi,

I will be streamin this mornin...almost getting ready for Level (Tier) 2 (!) and I had to put Bill in orbit - can I bring him back or should he stay aloft for a bit ! Hop on over and find out ...

Cmdr Zeta

Howdi,

Streamin this morning ... Doin contracts ... possible lifter design ... 25,50,100,150,250,500,750,1250 Science Node Tiers ... Funds are the same ... my tree seems very challenging and still fun to play - modded heavily of course...with Planet Factory and asteroids ported over as NasaMission doesnt work; asteroid encounters added with a 30 day or so leeway and I am making an asteroid belt and put some around various planets.

Even got a mission to Deen !

Cmdr Zeta

Howdi,

Streamin tonite... possible COMSAT missions ... contracts ...

Cmdr Zeta

Howdi,

Stream this mornin ... Setting Up COMSATS ... contracts ... and I am runnin out of contracts ugh ... need to look at Mun Venture ...

Cmdr Zeta

Howdi,

Tonite:

1): Firespitter MOD tests ! I never tried them exclusively so here we go ! Mostly checking out helos, IVAs, bomber bombay door... Sandbox mode...

2) After the DEMOS Explosions ans Schtuff its back to bizness with contracts in my career missions ...

Cmdr Zeta

Howdi,

Tonite:

1): Firespitter MOD tests ! I never tried them exclusively so here we go ! Mostly checking out helos .... Sandbox mode...

2) After the DEMOS Explosions and Schtuff its back to bizness with contracts in my career missions ...

I am doing this again tonite as last nite wasnt so great !

Cmdr Zeta

Hi,

Messin with Firespitter for the last time for a few minutes - probly doesnt work in v90...then headed off to contracts !

Zeta

Hello,

I shall be streamin this mornin...Contracts...gotta do em...looks like I am workin up to unmanned satellites...

Cmdr Zeta

Howdi,

More contracts ... possible COMSAT simulation flights - I already have crafts but I am trying to get to higher altitude without upgrading.

Streamin tonite for a couple hours ...

Cmdr Zeta

Greetings,

Just to make things clear as to how I roll ... yes I run SIMULATED flights prior to any major changes in my flights - any good space engineer tests out his or her space vehicles before sending REAL Kerbinauts up there; any space engineer who doesnt SIMULATE first is not only a fool but just plain doesnt make any sense; if the 'game' has it, use it I always say.

Also I am certainly not gonna let any Kerbalnaut die because of a game glitch; if one is spit out of EVA goin 100 miles an hour thats a glitch and reverts or quicksaves are allowed; depending on if it looks feasible that the Kerbal can be rescued.

I have taken a mulligan or 2 and lost 1 Kerbal so far; it happens. I am streamin this morning running SIM flights to test COMSAT feasibility and Rescue Ship sequencing; I may run real cnotract flights in between.

My missions are going well; I also need to run an escape trajectory SIM.

Cmdr Zeta

Hello,

Tonite - Contracts ... May try to rescue a Kerbal ...

Cmdr Zeta

Greetings,

Looks like the contracts are getting tougher ... streamin this mornin for a bit ...

Cmdr Zeta

Hello,

So Firespitter is gone except for a few parts; I may even weed those out as well.

Some solar panel locations in Science nodes are messed up but the Kerbalnauts know what they can research !

It's snowing outside again ...

The contracts are getting increasingly difficult for under 30 parts but we are still a go on some kool missions...

Streamin this mornin for awhile ...

Got Remote Tech figured out finally - decided to make a few adjustments to node placements and ranges - that is still a slight work in progress but it's lookin good.

Planet Factory is still glitchy am lookin at it a little today.

Cmdr Zeta

Hi,

Streamin this afternoon ... Fixing Planet Factory ! Didnt even know it was broke !

Cmdr Zeta

Howdi,

I spent all day figuring out Planet Factory (CE) today and Remote Tech the last few days...now I am ready again to press on wow what a mess it was...

Contracts are gettin tougher...finally I get to play again !! Stream is up for an hour...

Cmdr Zeta

Howdi,

Finally got Active Texture Management working - seems like version for KSPv25 works better I got about 3Gigs game memory going and I can actually play the game now with all my mods AND Planet Factory !

Streamin tonite for abit ... Contracts ...

Cmdr Zeta

Howdi,

I will be in Sandbox mode looking at MODS - I need to get rid of a few I cant even play the game yet harr and I NEED Planet Factory !

Cmdr Zeta

Howdi,

Tonite's stream - looking at resources to insure Kerbalnaut survival for long haul trips...long haul as in years !

I primarily use TACLIFE for all my Kerbal resource needs; food, water, oxygen, etc.

But resources eventually run out and we need recycling technologies to keep them alive for long periods as they may never return to Kerbin.

One problem is excess by-product management; if a block is filled it is assumed that excess is vented; isnt this called pollution !?

Basically and for now, Food is produced by hydroponics and other means; water is, ya, a recyclable resource although at a much lower rate; we have equipment researched (eventually in career mode) that can replenish resources.

Tonite I will be looking at these wonderful tools and possibly changing a few to meet my own 'KSP' needs for my Kerbalnauts.

Water is a mainstay of life and our Kerbals will be looking for it in space; we have heard that certain asteroids have alot of ice and CO2 which plants can use at night altho I dont think Biomass uses it that way (yet). Mun may have ice as well and I dont know how the extraxction process works but maybe I can touch on that tonite as well.

Cmdr Zeta

Howdi,

Title says it all ...

Cmdr Zeta

Howdi,

Well if our Kerbalnauts want to travel long distances for years at a time they need resources like food and water; and oxygen.

Biomass provides this need eventually and should take time to grow; say that it should be available after half of the trip time; I am going over STATS to figure this out this afternoon and modifying Biomass as to how I think it should work.

Streamin for a few hours this afternoon - yay harr !!

Cmdr Zeta

Hello,

Title says it all ... I will be making adjustments to make it work - I hope ...

It turns out that Taclife I cant do anything with; I have the numbers but the scaling graphics does not match the numbers on the command pods (stock) IE in other words I added resource allocation max amounts to the Hitchhiker Can to reflect amounts in the command pods but cannot control the graphics useage bar.

Using Biomass then requires useage calculation adjustments to even get it to work as intended; I am trying a workaround harr harr !!

Cmdr Zeta

Greetings,

Well Biomass is a nice MOD but it's configs are messed up.

So I decided I want to produce 1 food per day per Kerbalnaut at some point, but during their long space journeys they will eventually be able to make food and oxygen and other resources in limited quantities thru recycling and hydropnics.

My process is thus:

Waste/wastewater > Biomass and Microflora > Nutrients > Food and Seeds etc

It is a little bit backwards from the original configs where they make seeds from Biomass; you get seeds from flowering plants; eventually all supplies will run out unless they can make the subsustance by finding water and other needed resources on other planets; something our Kerbalnuats will learn when they get there !!

Using the Biomass template they will create byproducts for future use; such as making monopropellant from Kethane; most of the config data is left in tact as much as possible for simulation runs.

There is ALOT of simulation needed to get the amounts right and this is what I am streaming these last few days. I am stremain this mornin...

Cmdr Zeta

Howdi,

Getting Biomass to make food the way I want has been alot of pain but I am finally getting there...boring streams and simulations to get my Kerbalnauts ready for the long journeys ahead of them.

Hopefully gonna work on the 'ICE' resource tonite and work on a viable food solution after they get out there.

Stream is up but I restart KSP on several occasions thoughout...

Cmdr Zeta

Hello,

So I been havin a difficult time with BioMass but I am making progress...

Microflora and Nutrients are ready to be made over the long haul...

I think...I figured out how to set a timer for food production...IE no food production start til after 90 days or thereabouts then I get 1 food per day; now I just remembered Kerbals eat 1.5 food a day so they need another process to make up the diff.

I am adding ICE to the mix as well as other chemicals for say snack production; afterall half my food is snacks so why not !!

Other fuel resources creation is in the hard configs for BioMass; I couldnt manipulate those configs so I am working with the parts directly.

Streamin this mornin ...

Cmdr Zeta
